title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
OB:
The code is changed to:

baz(x.foo().foo())

I would rather it gave me:

baz(x.foo().x.foo())
EB: The code assist should only replace the selected portion of code and not consume additional code.
SR:
Change the baz call to

baz(x.x.foo())

Place the cursor after the first "x."

Press CtrlSpace to bring up the code assist

Type "f" to filter the list

Select "foo()"
